title: Happy Kitty Bunny Pony: A Saccharine Mouthful of Super Cute
description: From turn-of-the-century novelties and Depression-era distraction, through wartime comfort, to Hello Kitty and Jeff Koons, a collection of more than two hundred images of cute things is spiked with fun and curious facts, bits of sarcasm, and dry and not-so-dry wit as surprising and bizarre as the images themselves.
author: Michael J. Nelson
